com.interpss.core.algo

Interface LoadflowAlgorithm

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.hazelcast.nio.serialization.DataSerializable, org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, IAclfNetBVisitor, NameTag, NetworkRef<BaseAclfNetwork<?,?>>, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LoadflowAlgorithmImpl

    public interface LoadflowAlgorithm
extends NetworkRef<BaseAclfNetwork<?,?>>, IAclfNetBVisitor
    A representation of the model object 'Loadflow Algorithm'. Implement Loadflow algorithms (NR, PQ, GS and Custome). For adjustment, there are two important concepts: 1) Adjustment at Bus/Branch level, for example, apply PVBusLimit, TapControl. LfAlgo.applyAdjustAlgo turns on/off the adjustment. This category will be done in each LF iteration step. The LfAdjustAlgorithm class is for this category. 2) NetAdjustment - some adjustments are applied outside Loadflow iteration at the Network level. When to apply might need to be controlled. NetAdjustAlgorithm class is for implementing this set of adjustments. For serialization - AclfNet object and INRSolver object are trainsient. It can be applied to single network and multiple networks Loadflow calculation.

    The following features are supported:

    • Lf Method
    • Non Divergent
    • Max Iterations
    • Tolerance
    • Turn Off Island Bus
    • B11 Matrix Dirty
    • Gs Acc Factor
    • Init Bus Voltage
    • Data Check Config
    • Net Adj Algo
    • Lf Adj Algo
    • Custom Method
    • Lf Calculator
    • Multi Net Solver
    See Also:
    CoreAlgorithmPackage.getLoadflowAlgorithm()

      • getMaxIterations

        int getMaxIterations()
        Returns the value of the 'Max Iterations' attribute. The default value is "20".

        If the meaning of the 'Max Iterations' attribute isn't clear, there really should be more of a description here...

        attribute for max iterations for loadflow. For multi-net Loadflow, it also controls number of iterations between the main network and the child network(s).
        Returns:
        the value of the 'Max Iterations' attribute.
        See Also:
        setMaxIterations(int), CoreAlgorithmPackage.getLoadflowAlgorithm_MaxIterations()

      • loadflow

        boolean loadflow()
          throws InterpssException
        perform LoadFlow calculation. The algorithm used will be determined by the lfMethod attribute.
        Throws:
        InterpssException

      • needAdjustment

        boolean needAdjustment()
                throws IpssNumericException
        Check if there is a need to perform adjustment. It delegates the decision to the LfAdjustAlgorithm and NetAdjustAlgorithm. The info is used when checking LF convergence. The actual adjustment might be delayed depending on adjustment implementation.
        Throws:
        IpssNumericException

      • performAdjustment

        boolean performAdjustment(Mismatch netMismatch,
                          AclfMethod lfMethod)
        Perform adjustment. It delegates the action to the LfAdjustAlgorithm and NetAdjustAlgorithm. Rules may be implement to determine when the adjustment might be performed.
        Parameters:
        netMismatch - max mismatch in the network
        lfMethod - Aclf method
